title: input controls
extract: Input Controls are an integral part to any form. They allow a user to perform a variety of functions, e.g. , type in text, select items from a list, upload a file, etc. . Challenges disabled users face with input controls are: Knowing what input control is active on the page.Dec 15, 2011
extract_html: Input Controls are an integral part to any form. They allow a user to perform a variety of functions, e.g. , type in text, select items from a list, upload a file, etc. . Challenges disabled users face with input controls are: Knowing what input control is active on the page.Dec 15, 2011
